thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 716
thread.title: SIMEON CRYER
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by SIMEON CRYER

author: SIMEON CRYER
title: SIMEON CRYER
text:
I was stranded in Hobart. I needed to get to Launceston for a business meeting the next day and a problem with my booking at Avis left me with no car. The manager at redspot was the most helpful staff member I think I've ever come across. She couldn't do enough to help me.
I happen to teach companies on all things marketing and branding, and your manager is exactly the person I tech about but almost never experience.
Seth Godin writes and speaks about artists in business - the art is a thing you can't train (like a hostess taking an infant for a cuddle to relieve a stressed out mum on a flight).
We need to pay these artists more because they are invaluable to the customer experience which is our brand.
Thank you
